MarikaTheEternal.description: The eternal goddess of the Golden Order and vessel of the Greater Will, whose inscrutable presence shapes the very fabric of the Lands Between.

Godfrey.description: The first Elden Lord and a stalwart champion of the Golden Order, renowned for his martial prowess and unyielding honor.

Radagon.description: A charismatic and formidable warrior, Radagon embodies both mortal strength and divine legacy, his life intertwined with both valor and mystery.

RennalaQueenOfTheFullMoon.description: The enigmatic Queen of the Full Moon and master of sorcery at the Academy of Raya Lucaria, whose arcane wisdom is steeped in lunar mysteries.

GodwynTheGolden.description: A cherished demigod of divine heritage, whose brief life and luminous legacy continue to echo through the annals of the Lands Between.

Morgott.description: Known as the Omen King, Morgott is a tragic demigod burdened by a cursed fate, a living testament to the darker undercurrents of divine legacy.

Mohg.description: The Lord of Blood, Mohg commands a sinister realm of corruption and raw, dark power, marked by rituals steeped in ancestral malice.

Radahn.description: Radahn, the Starscourge, is a legendary demigod whose colossal martial might and celestial influence have etched him into the lore of epic battle.

Ranni.description: Ranni the Witch is a mysterious and defiant demigod, weaving her own destiny through profound arcane power and a determination to reshape fate.
